snippet.title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Making a Monster: Behind-the-Scenes Cinematic Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description: Join Tripwire Interactive's studio creative director Bryan Wynia, Hydra Studios' director Neil Huxley, and Hydra Studios's art director Milan Nikolic for a behind-the-scenes look at the Killing Floor 3 cinematic trailer. The team reveals more about this upcoming action-horror game, the game's near-future setting, as well as the body horror elements in its art direction and the terrifying creature design.
